titles.title: A resolution supporting the designation of October 2020 as "National Substance Abuse Prevention Month".
A resolution supporting the designation of October 2020 as "National Substance Abuse Prevention Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of October 2020 as National Substance Abuse Prevention Month and other efforts to address substance use and misuse.
